title: 3 and Out - No Preseason Games Winners/Losers; Top 5 Teams Built To Handle Corona Camp; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - No Preseason Games Winners/Losers; Top 5 Teams Built To Handle Corona Camp; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John examines the effects of the NFL eliminating preseason games, his top 5 teams that are built to overcome the 2020 corona camp, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
